name: Salvation Army Chinatown
description: The Salvation Army is a community center and a social services provider located in Chinatown of San Francisco. They provide a variety of bilingual (English/Chinese) programs and services for children, families and senior citizens. These include afterschool tutoring, summer camps, karate & music classes, community meals, food pantries, organized sports, and volunteer opportunities.
